string.text: Заблокирован игрой до {BANNEDUNTIL}, по причине: {BANREASON}
Игрок не состоит в отряде.
Только лидер отряда может исключать игроков.
Игрок которого вы пытаетесь исключить, не состоит в отряде!
Игрок {INVITEDPLAYER} уже состоит в отряде.
Вы должны находиться в лобби, чтобы назначать игроков.
Вы должны находиться в лобби, чтобы распустить отряд![Временно]
Игрок {INVITEE} получил приглашение в отряд от {INVITER}.
Нельзя назначать самого себя!
В вашем отряде никого не осталось и он был распущен!
Чтобы вступить в сражение, вам нужно выбрать режим.
Вы не можете начать сражение, потому что ваш регион недоступен.
Вы должны находиться в лобби, чтобы приглашать игроков в свой отряд!
Назначать игроков может только лидер отряда.
Вы не можете приглашать себя.
{PLAYERNAME} отключился. Инвайт в отряд отменен.
Игрок {INVITEDPLAYER} не в лобби.
Вы не состоите в отряде!
Не удалось войти.
Приглашать игроков может только лидер.
Вы должны находиться в лобби, чтобы выгнать кого-то из вашего отряда![Временно]
Не удалось найти игрока, которого вы пытались повысить
Ваш отряд полон.
{PLAYERNAME} Пригласил вас в отряд.
Отключенные игровые режимы: {GAMETYPES}.
Невозможно начать сражение, пока все игроки не будут готовы.
Невозможно начать сражение, потому что не все игроки используют античит.
Не удалось завершить старую сессию.
Игрок {PLAYERNAME} назначен лидером отряда.
Отряд расформирован!
Ошибка!
Несовпадение версий игры, Версия сервера: {SERVERVERSION} - Ваша версия: {CLIENTVERSION}.
{PLAYERNAME} назначен лидером отряда.
Вы можете приглашать только игроков, использующих античит.
Чтобы вступить в отряд или начать игру, античит должен быть запущен!
Только лидер отряда может начать сражение.
Сейчас в отряде состоят следующие игроки: {PLAYERS}
Не получилось найти игрока
Игрок, которого вы пытаетесь повысить, не состоит в вашем отряде.
Вы были кикнуты анти-читом. Причина: {KICKREASON}
Нельзя стоять в очереди на бой, потому что некоторые игроки заблокированы от сватовства.
Нельзя стоять в очереди на битву, потому что вы заблокированы от сватовства.
You are blocked from matchmaking for {PUNISHMENTDURATION} seconds.
You have accepted the friend request
Could not report player. Player cannot be found.
Friend has been removed
Player has been reported.
{PLAYER} accepted your friend request
You are already friends
{PLAYER} declined your friend request
You are muted until {MUTEDUNTIL}, Reason: {MUTEREASON}
Your friend request is forwarded to {PLAYER}.
You have already sent a request
You are now friends with {PLAYER}
You have received a friend request from {PLAYER}
Friend request cannot be found
Friend cannot be found
You cannot add yourself as friend
You have declined the friend request
Could not report player. Game cannot be found.
Player cannot be found
Invalid text.
You have to be in a party to see clan game list.
Your party is not eligible for clan games.
Clan faction changed successfully.
Player is in a different clan.
Player not found.
{PLAYERNAME} declined clan invitation.
You cannot suggest someone to party as party leader.
You must be at lobby to destroy a clan.
Player removed from clan.
You must be at lobby to kick someone from your clan.
You have to be at lobby to delete clan announcements.
You must be at lobby to add an announcement.
You must be the clan leader to change sigil.
Could not change selected game mode
Incorrect password.
You have to be in a party to create a clan.
Announcement added successfully.
Invited player is not at lobby.
Only the leader of the clan can edit announcements.
You are not in a clan.

But you aren't in a clan.
You must be at lobby to change clan information text.
You are already in a clan.
Player invited to clan.

Player {SUGGESTEDPLAYER} is suggested to be invited to the party.
You can only suggest players running the game with Anti-cheat.
You have to be at lobby to invite someone to clan.
Player {SUGGESTEDPLAYER} is already in a party.
No text entered.
Player successfully promoted to clan leader.
Invalid game type.
You have to be at lobby to see clan game list.
You have to be at lobby to edit clan announcements.
You have to be the clan leader to kick someone.
Information text changed successfully.
Only the leader of the clan can delete announcements.
You have to be the clan leader to invite someone to clan.
Clan name is already in use.
You must be the clan leader to add an announcement.
Invited player is already in a clan.
Your party does not have enough players to create a clan.
Player already invited to another clan.
You have to be in lobby to create a clan.
You have to be at lobby.
You must be at lobby to suggest someone to your party.
You have to be the leader of the clan to promote someone.
Premade game creation canceled by {PLAYERNAME}
Player is not in your clan.
You must be in a party to suggest someone to your party.
Game not found.
You must be in a clan to change clan information text. Obviously.
Left clan.
You have to be in a party to create a clan game.
You can not promote yourself to clan leader.
Text can't be longer than {MAX_LENGTH} characters.
You are not in a party.
Clan sigil changed successfully.
Announcement deleted successfully.
Player is not online.
You have to be the party leader to create a clan game.
You cannot suggest yourself to party.
You have to be creating a clan game to cancel one.
You have to be in a clan to create a clan game.
Your Bannerlord ID is updated successfully
Not all players are ready.
You must be at lobby to change clan sigil.
You are not the party leader.
You must be the clan leader to change faction.
Player {SUGGESTEDPLAYER} is not at lobby.
Party not eligible for clan game.
You have to be at lobby to create a clan game.
{PLAYERNAME} accepted clan invitation.
You must be the clan leader to destroy a clan.
You must be at lobby to change clan faction.
You can't invite yourself.
Announcement changed successfully.
Could not change region
Your party is not eligible to create a clan game.
You must be the clan leader to change clan information text.

Clan tag is already in use.
